alert.note: Alert for Pottawattamie; Shelby (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 17 at 7:14PM CDT until September 17 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Pottawattamie County in southwestern Iowa... Southern Shelby County in southwestern Iowa... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 713 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles north of Council Bluffs Airport, or 7 miles northeast of Council Bluffs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Underwood around 725 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Minden, Oakland, Hancock and Avoca. This includes Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 8 and 23, and between mile markers 34 and 40. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
